export_name: TM Direct Ibiza – Microservices MASTER v1

microservices.ai_prompt_template: Create a job card for interior painting of {{ip_scope_rooms}} with surfaces in {{ip_condition}} condition. Ceiling height {{ip_height}}m. Prep: {{ip_prep_needed}}. Paint: {{ip_paint_type}} with {{ip_finish}} finish. Colours: {{ip_colour}}. Access: {{ip_access}}.
Repaint project for {{rp_scope}} including {{rp_rooms_types}}. Property occupied: {{rp_occ}}. Prep: {{rp_prep_level}}. Spray: {{rp_spray}}. Deadline: {{rp_deadline}}.
Decorative finish {{vp_finish_type}} on {{vp_area}}m² over {{vp_substrate}}. Sealer {{vp_sealer}}. Details: {{vp_details}}. Colour: {{vp_colour}}.
Remove {{wr_layers}} layers of {{wr_type}} wallpaper from {{wr_rooms}} walls. Steam: {{wr_steam_ok}}. Make-good: {{wr_makegood}}.
Supply & install {{dg_glass}} glazing in {{dg_qty}} {{dg_material}} frames, {{dg_opening}} style. Access: {{dg_access}}.
Install {{sky_type}} {{sky_qty}} skylight(s) on a {{sky_roof}} roof with {{sky_flash}}. Access: {{sky_access}}.
Supply & fit {{bd_system}} doors for opening {{bd_width}}mm x {{bd_height}}mm. Threshold: {{bd_threshold}}. Thermal: {{bd_thermal}}.
Install {{gb_type}} {{gb_glass}} glass for {{gb_length}}m at {{gb_location}}.
Repair {{sr_issue}} on {{sr_frame}} frames; {{sr_qty}} unit(s). Access: {{sr_access}}.
Install wall-mounted split AC with {{ac_rooms}} indoor units (rooms {{ac_room_sizes}}). Outdoor {{ac_location}}, pipe runs {{ac_pipe_runs}}. Power {{ac_power}}. Permits: {{ac_permits}}.
Design & install MVHR for {{mvhr_property}} connecting {{mvhr_rooms}}. Location: {{mvhr_space}}. Ducting: {{mvhr_duct}}. Airtightness: {{mvhr_airtight}}.

questions.text: Number of AC/vent units on site

microservices.ai_prompt_template: Service contract for {{svc_units}} units ({{svc_types}}) on a {{svc_frequency}} basis. Hours: {{svc_hours}}.
Plumbing install for {{pk_rooms}} with {{pk_scope}}. Hot water: {{pk_heating}}. Tiling/waterproofing: {{pk_tiles}}. Fixtures: {{pk_appliances}}.
Underfloor heating {{ufh_type}} over {{ufh_area}}m² on {{ufh_subfloor}} subfloor with {{ufh_covering}} finish. Zones: {{ufh_zones}}.
Upgrade consumer unit from {{cu_existing}} to modern board with {{cu_circuits}} circuits, {{cu_rcd}}. Certification: {{cu_cert}}.
Design smart lighting/climate for {{sm_rooms}} on {{sm_platform}} with sensors {{sm_sensors}}. Scenes: {{sm_scenes}}.
Install EV charger {{ev_rate}} using {{ev_power}} supply. Connector {{ev_cable}}. Location: {{ev_location}}. Smart: {{ev_smart}}.
Build {{dk_material}} decking {{dk_area}}m² with substructure: {{dk_substructure}}. Extras: {{dk_steps}}. Finish: {{dk_finish}}.
Supply/fit {{dr_type}} doors x{{dr_qty}}. Finish {{dr_finish}}. Hardware: {{dr_hardware}}.
Install {{fl_type}} over {{fl_area}}m² with {{fl_prep}} prep. Pattern: {{fl_pattern}}. Skirtings: {{fl_skirtings}}.
Supply/install {{wt_type}} windows x{{wt_qty}} in {{wt_mat}} with {{wt_glass}} glazing.
Exterior painting {{ep_surface}} {{ep_area}}m². Wash: {{ep_wash}}. Coating: {{ep_coating}}. Access: {{ep_access}}.
Install {{wc_material}} wallcoverings on {{wc_walls}} walls. Pattern: {{wc_pattern}}. Lining: {{wc_lining}}.
EICR for {{eicr_prop}} property. Access: {{eicr_access}}. Reason: {{eicr_use}}.
Install {{service}} over {{rf_area}}m² on {{rf_substrate}} with {{rf_insulation}} insulation. Drainage: {{rf_outlets}}.
Interior strip-out covering {{dm_scope}}. Waste: {{dm_waste}}. Asbestos: {{dm_asbestos}}. Access: {{dm_access}}.
